text: Malbun is a ski-resort village in the eastern exclave of the municipality of Triesenberg, in Liechtenstein. == Gallery == File:Mountain chapel.jpg|"Peace Chapel" File:Hotel-Malbun.jpg|Hotel Malbun File:Haus-Malbun2.jpg|Cottage in the mountains Category:Villages in Liechtenstein Category:Ski areas and resorts
title: Malbun
